summary: UI copy update: rename the cafe to 拾壹咖啡 and switch Today coffee to 哥伦比亚 · 慧兰.

validation.command: python3 -c "from pathlib import Path; html=Path('index.html').read_text(encoding='utf-8'); assert '拾壹咖啡' in html; assert '哥伦比亚 · 慧兰' in html; assert '埃塞俄比亚 · 耶加雪菲' not in html; print('content checks: ok')"

notes: Updated index.html: renamed the cafe to “拾壹咖啡” (title/meta/header/footer) and switched Today 推荐 to “哥伦比亚 · 慧兰” with updated notes/badges; also updated the displayed contact email to hello@shiyi.coffee to match the new branding (revert if the original domain should be kept). Validation: python3 content assertions passed.
